title: Conceptos Esenciales de MBA
about: Desarrolle un conjunto de herramientas de habilidades clave estratégicas, gerenciales y de liderazgo para los negocios.
University name: The London School of Economics and Political Science
Effort: De 8 a 12 horas semanales de aprendizaje en línea
Course overview:
Descripción general del curso97/100El puntaje de importancia que los empleadores atribuyen al pensamiento estratégico como una habilidad que se enseña en la MBA.QS Top MBA (Feb, 2021).60 %El porcentaje de ejecutivos que informan que un comportamiento de liderazgo sólido es fundamental para lograr la preparación futura en los negocios.Deloitte (2021).Duración: 10 semanas (sin incluir la orientación)
Si bien una MBA lo capacita para ver el mundo de los negocios de manera diferente, la experiencia financiera y la perspicacia comercial, aunque son vitales, no son suficientes para influir en el liderazgo de su organización. Para que sean verdaderamente efectivas, estas habilidades básicas deben combinarse con técnicas de liderazgo sólidas y una comprensión de su entorno estratégico.
El curso de certificado en línea de Conceptos Esenciales de MBA de la Escuela de Economía y Ciencia Política de Londres (London School of Economics and Political Science, LSE) está diseñado para ayudarlo a comprender su entorno estratégico, dominar los detalles financieros e impulsar el éxito empresarial al influir en sus colegas y en los consumidores. Estará equipado con un conjunto de herramientas esenciales de MBA mientras navega por el entorno empresarial contemporáneo, con la orientación del reconocido cuerpo docente de la LSE.
Este curso de certificado en línea de la LSE, basado en la MBA, le brinda habilidades comerciales técnicas e interpersonales para maximizar su ventaja competitiva y liderar con influencia.
¿Este curso es para usted?Este curso de certificado en línea es ideal para cualquier profesional interesado en mejorar sus habilidades técnicas e interpersonales para tener éxito en los negocios. Gerentes, empresarios y especialistas, incluidos consultores y analistas, se beneficiarán del enfoque interactivo y guiado del aprendizaje y la oportunidad de hacer crecer su red global en línea. El enfoque en la mecánica del liderazgo, la influencia y la estrategia, combinado con las habilidades técnicas empresariales y financieras, proporciona una experiencia de aprendizaje integral para profesionales en una variedad de funciones e industrias. La capacidad de aplicar habilidades derivadas de una MBA a funciones actuales y futuras beneficiará a quienes buscan el crecimiento profesional, así como aquellos interesados en obtener una MBA completa en el futuro.Este curso se ofrece en español traducido. Se requiere dominio del inglés para navegar el curso, incluido el registro y el pago del curso, así como ciertos elementos del campus virtual.
La mayoría de los materiales didácticos y materiales de apoyo se han traducido del inglés original al español (tenga en cuenta que los videos tienen subtítulos). Las tareas y los comentarios se proporcionan en español. El apoyo académico y estudiantil está a cargo de hispanohablantes. El entorno de aprendizaje (campus virtual) está diseñado para ayudar a los hispanohablantes con dominio del inglés. El soporte técnico está disponible en inglés. Los certificados se proporcionarán en inglés.  
Adicionalmente, se le pedirá que acepte los Términos y Condiciones en inglés que rigen el Curso. Se dispone de una copia en español aquí. Si hubiera algún conflicto entre las versiones en inglés y español de los Términos y Condiciones, prevalecerá la versión en inglés, según corresponda.



Este curso está certificado por el CPD Certification Service (Servicio de Certificación CPD) del Reino Unido, y pueden inscribirse las personas que son miembros de organismos profesionales con sede en el Reino Unido o que están asociadas con ellos. El curso tiene aproximadamente 95 horas de aprendizaje.
Nota: si desea solicitar una actividad del CPD, la responsabilidad es suya. La Escuela de Economía y Ciencia Política de Londres (London School of Economics and Political Science, LSE) y GetSmarter no aceptan responsabilidad alguna, y no pueden ser considerados responsables, por la reclamación o validación de horas o puntos.
Course curriculum: {'Módulo de orientación': 'Bienvenida al campus virtual', 'Módulo 1': 'Liderar con influencia', 'Módulo 2': 'Economía para gerentes', 'Módulo 3': 'Estrategia competitiva', 'Módulo 4': 'Estrategia corporativa', 'Módulo 5': 'Contabilidad financiera', 'Módulo 6': 'Contabilidad de gestión', 'Módulo 7': 'Análisis de estados financieros', 'Módulo 8': 'En la mente del gerente', 'Módulo 9': '"Empujoncitos" ("nudging") para cambiar el comportamiento', 'Módulo 10': 'La cultura organizacional como herramienta de liderazgo'}
Convenors: {'Dra Connson Locke': ['Profesora titular en práctica, departamento de Administración de la LSE', 'https://www.getsmarter.com/rails/active_storage/representations/eyJfcmFpbHMiOnsibWVzc2FnZSI6IkJBaHBBdUlPIiwiZXhwIjpudWxsLCJwdXIiOiJibG9iX2lkIn19--ef5ae5661c1bf9570f2e70c873db5a62e4e3dfcd/eyJfcmFpbHMiOnsibWVzc2FnZSI6IkJBaDdCam9MY21WemFYcGxTU0lNTVRFd2VERXhNQVk2QmtWVSIsImV4cCI6bnVsbCwicHVyIjoidmFyaWF0aW9uIn19--e8e4d52386516ed9566f111cb5206b7b0185063d/lse_negotiation_programme_course_convenor_connson_lock.jpeg']}
What will set you apart: ['Una comprensión más sólida de los tres pilares centrales del negocio (el entorno estratégico, el kit de herramientas financieras y el factor humano) que puede utilizar para mejorar la ventaja competitiva de su organización.', 'Habilidades técnicas comerciales y financieras para comprender, analizar y optimizar las operaciones comerciales.', 'Perspectivas sobre el comportamiento humano y la influencia, que pueden utilizarse para expandir su impacto interno y externo.', 'Competencia gerencial mejorada y mayor confianza en su camino al liderazgo estratégico e influyente.', '']
About the certificate:
Desarrolle habilidades de pensamiento crítico, mejore las competencias gerenciales y obtenga un certificado oficial de competencia de the London School of Economics and Political Science (la Escuela de Economía y Ciencia Política de Londres).
La evaluación es continua y se basa en una serie de trabajos prácticos que se completan en línea. Para obtener un certificado, deberá cumplir con los requisitos descritos en el manual del curso. El manual estará disponible para usted en cuanto comience el curso.
What past students think: {'Rafael Christoph HerokVicepresidente, Cuentas Clave de Movilidad y Proyectos Especiales, Siemens EAU': '"Excelente curso. Incluye muchos ejemplos prácticos que son relevantes y útiles en el trabajo diario. Me ayudó a obtener mayor información sobre los comportamientos de las personas, las tácticas de influencia, las perspectivas del mercado y las direcciones estratégicas. Definitivamente he aumentado mis conocimientos y me siento muy motivado para concentrarme en mi próximo paso profesional. Recomiendo mucho este curso, ¡en especial a los profesionales con poco tiempo libre!"'}

title: Diversity, Inclusion, and Belonging in the Workplace
about: Gain the insights and practical tools to advance inclusivity within your organization.
Course overview:
Course overviewOrganizations with sustainable diversity and inclusion initiatives show a 20% increase in inclusion, leading to higher employee retention and performance.Gartner (Apr, 2022).Diverse organizations see 2.3 times higher revenue per employee.Built In (Jun, 2022).Duration: 2 weeksHaving a diverse and inclusive workplace isn’t just ethical, it’s good for business too. From improved organizational performance to greater employee retention — diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) drives organizational value.1
The Diversity, Inclusion, and Belonging in the Workplace online micro course from the Weinberg College of Arts and Sciences at Northwestern University focuses on the importance of building a business case for DEI within the corporate setting. Over the course of two weeks, you’ll build a deeper understanding of the root causes of workplace inequality, guided by Professor Alvin B. Tillery, a thought leader in racial politics and presidential leadership. You’ll also develop tools to implement and advance DEI initiatives as you gain insight into how change-related challenges can be resolved within the workplace.
This two-week online micro course forms part of the full six-week Leading Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion online short course from the Weinberg College of Arts and Sciences at Northwestern University, which expands on the importance of DEI across various industries, including corporates, government, nonprofits, and the wider public sector.
1 Built In (Jun, 2022).
Is this course for you?This online micro course is ideal for those seeking to understand how to build more diverse and inclusive teams at work. It explores the dynamics of DEI within the workplace, and provides the tools for making a business case for it. This applies to those already working in the DEI space as specialists, HR professionals, recruiters, managers, and C-suite and top-level executives who wish to prioritize DEI within their organizations.
What will set you apart: ['An understanding of how to create an inclusive corporate culture that boosts employee diversity, engagement, and strong team performance.', 'The ability to build a sound business case for DEI which develops your future workforce, fosters a sense of belonging, and maximizes company profit.', 'The skills and insights to address change management challenges when implementing DEI strategies at work.', 'Unlimited access to 2U’s Career Engagement Network, offering you exclusive resources and events to support your professional journey and drive your career forward.', '', 'Experience rapid upskilling over just two weeks, online', 'Gain expert insights, delivered in a compact learning format', 'Interact with your peers and learning facilitators through class-wide forums ', 'Enjoy a wide range of engaging and interactive components, including videos, activities, and resources ', 'Apply what you learn throughout this two-week online micro course experience and develop the tools to implement effective DEI initiatives within your organization. ']
About the certificate: Validate your skills online with an official digital badge from the Weinberg College of Arts and Sciences at Northwestern University.

title: CRISPR: Gene-editing Applications
about: Understand the potential of CRISPR technology in the biofuel, agriculture, and healthcare industries.
Course overview:
Course overview26.9%The forecasted compound annual growth rate of the global CRISPR market by 2030.

Research and Markets (Jan, 2021).
2020The year that CRISPR technology pioneers Jennifer Doudna and Emmanuelle Charpentier were awarded the Nobel Prize in Chemistry.

The Wall Street Journal (Oct, 2020).
Duration: 8 weeks (excluding orientation)CRISPR shares the same space as blockchain and IoT payments as one of the most disruptive innovations of recent years. This gene-editing tool has already impacted industries such as biofuel, agriculture, and healthcare, with its global market potential growing exponentially.This online short course from Harvard's Office of the Vice Provost for Advances in Learning (VPAL), in association with HarvardX, provides you with a comprehensive understanding of the CRISPR Cas9 gene-editing technology, its vast applications, and the market opportunities that genetic engineering presents. With a specific industry focus and through real-world case studies, you’ll explore the applications of CRISPR in biotechnology and how it will assist the development of disease-resistant cultivars, improve food yields, and allow biofuels to become a viable alternative energy source. You’ll analyze the possibilities of curing inherited genetic disorders, treating infectious diseases, and advancing the fight against cancer. Equipped with industry insight into the ethical implications of gene-editing, this course will give you a holistic understanding of the CRISPR landscape and its future potential.Is this course for you?This is not a technical course and no lab skills or prior knowledge of genetic engineering is required to participate. This course gives a comprehensive overview of the CRISPR DNA editing landscape for investors or entrepreneurs looking for the knowledge needed to make strategic business decisions about this disruptive technology. Those working in biotechnology or pharmaceutical product development, sales, or manufacturing will also find value as the content explores the future applications of CRISPR across the economy. Professionals involved in policy and law can also benefit from building a greater understanding of the ethical considerations regarding CRISPR and genetic modification.
Course curriculum: {'Orientation module': 'Welcome to your Online Campus', 'Module 1': 'Basic principles of molecular biology', 'Module 2': 'CRISPR and genetic engineering', 'Module 3': 'Treating genetic diseases', 'Module 4': 'Promoting resistance to infectious diseases', 'Module 5': 'Combating cancer through research and treatment', 'Module 6': 'Optimizing and fighting microorganisms: The food, health, and energy industries', 'Module 7': 'Improving agriculture: Optimizing crops', 'Module 8': 'The ethics of using CRISPR'}
Convenors: {'Alain Viel': ['Senior Lecturer in Molecular and Cellular Biology, and Director of Northwest Undergraduate Laboratories, Harvard University', 'https://www.getsmarter.com/rails/active_storage/representations/eyJfcmFpbHMiOnsibWVzc2FnZSI6IkJBaHBBaDhGIiwiZXhwIjpudWxsLCJwdXIiOiJibG9iX2lkIn19--e3610f5a29cc9eb2c2cf7859d2382d2287caf3e3/eyJfcmFpbHMiOnsibWVzc2FnZSI6IkJBaDdCam9MY21WemFYcGxTU0lNTVRFd2VERXhNQVk2QmtWVSIsImV4cCI6bnVsbCwicHVyIjoidmFyaWF0aW9uIn19--e8e4d52386516ed9566f111cb5206b7b0185063d/harvard_vpal_crispr_gene-editing_editing_applications_course_convenor_alain_viel.jpg']}
What will set you apart: ['The ability to understand CRISPR technology and its potential application in the biofuel, agriculture, and healthcare industries.', 'The knowledge to identify market opportunities and consider the ethical implications of genetic modification. ', 'The industry insight and technological understanding to better communicate your company’s potential biotech initiative to business decision makers.', 'Unlimited access to 2U’s Career Engagement Network, offering you exclusive resources and events to support your professional journey and drive your career forward.', '']
About the certificate: Study CRISPR Cas9 gene-editing technology and earn an official premier certificate from Harvard’s Office of the Vice Provost for Advances in Learning (VPAL), in association with HarvardX. Assessment is continuous and based on a series of practical assignments completed online. In order to be issued with a certificate, you’ll need to meet the requirements outlined in the course handbook. The handbook will be made available to you as soon as you begin the course.

title: Programa de Desarrollo de Liderazgo de Mujeres de Oxford
about: Supere las barreras de género y crezca como líder dentro de su carrera profesional y organización.
Course overview:
Descripción general del cursoTrece billones de USD El monto que el PIB global podría aumentar en 2030 si se tomaran medidas urgentes para promover la igualdad de género.McKinsey & Company (jul de 2020).18 %El porcentaje de compañías encuestadas a nivel mundial que tienen una mujer en la alta gerencia.World Economic Forum (enero de 2020).Duración: 6 semanas (sin incluir la orientación)Una y otra vez, el mundo de los negocios ha sido testigo de las numerosas ventajas de emplear a más mujeres en puestos de liderazgo. Solucionar el sesgo de género y los desafíos en el lugar de trabajo se está convirtiendo en una necesidad para las organizaciones, la sociedad y la economía en general.El programa de Desarrollo de liderazgo de mujeres de Oxford de Saïd Business School, University of Oxford, le ofrece la oportunidad de tener una mirada crítica sobre su propio estilo y fortalezas de liderazgo en el transcurso de seis semanas, en línea.Con un enfoque al liderazgo como práctica reflexiva, este programa está estructurado en torno a tres temas principales: autoaceptación, autogestión y desarrollo personal. Al cuestionar los sesgos de género en el lugar de trabajo que enfrentan las líderes mujeres, usted explorará las habilidades necesarias para liderar, influenciar, negociar y navegar situaciones difíciles. ¿Es este programa para usted?Este programa en línea de desarrollo de liderazgo tiene como objetivo equipar mejor a las líderes actuales para navegar los numerosos desafíos y sesgos de género que ponen trabas a las mujeres profesionales en el lugar de trabajo. Las tareas del programa también están diseñadas para ayudar a las mujeres aspirantes a puestos gerenciales y ejecutivos a desarrollar las habilidades de liderazgo fundamentales para influenciar, persuadir, empoderar y guiar. Aquellas mujeres que se preparan para la transición a funciones de gerencia superior o nivel directivo podrán profundizar su conocimiento sobre el liderazgo al reflexionar sobre momentos crisol y abordajes de situaciones desafiantes. Este programa satisfará a aquellas mujeres que buscan superar las barreras de género en los negocios y crecer en sus carreras profesionales como en su organización.

Este curso se ofrece en español traducido. Se requiere dominio del inglés para navegar el curso, incluido el registro y el pago del curso, así como ciertos elementos del campus virtual.

La mayoría de los materiales didácticos y materiales de apoyo se han traducido del inglés original al español (tenga en cuenta que los videos tienen subtítulos). Las tareas y los comentarios se proporcionan en español. El apoyo académico y estudiantil está a cargo de hispanohablantes. El entorno de aprendizaje (campus virtual) está diseñado para ayudar a los hispanohablantes con dominio del inglés. El soporte técnico está disponible en inglés. Los certificados se proporcionarán en inglés.

Adicionalmente, se le pedirá que acepte los Términos y Condiciones en inglés que rigen el Curso. Se dispone de una copia en español aquí. Si hubiera algún conflicto entre las versiones en inglés y español de los Términos y Condiciones, prevalecerá la versión en inglés, según corresponda.
Course curriculum: {'Módulo de orientación': 'Bienvenida a su campus virtual', 'Módulo 1': 'Aceptarse como líder', 'Módulo 2': 'Comprender su contexto', 'Módulo 3': 'Negociar como una práctica de liderazgo', 'Módulo 4': 'Convertirse en una líder influyente', 'Módulo 5': 'Desarrollarse como líder: ¿qué puede ayudarla?', 'Módulo 6': 'Imaginar sus posibilidades futuras como líder'}
Convenors: {'Sue Dopson': ['Profesora de Conducta Organizacional de Rhodes Trust, Saïd Business School, University of Oxford', 'https://www.getsmarter.com/rails/active_storage/representations/eyJfcmFpbHMiOnsibWVzc2FnZSI6IkJBaHBBbVlQIiwiZXhwIjpudWxsLCJwdXIiOiJibG9iX2lkIn19--d03277e9c6779c16368808b8d0e2dd7d96b6766f/eyJfcmFpbHMiOnsibWVzc2FnZSI6IkJBaDdCam9MY21WemFYcGxTU0lNTVRFd2VERXhNQVk2QmtWVSIsImV4cCI6bnVsbCwicHVyIjoidmFyaWF0aW9uIn19--e8e4d52386516ed9566f111cb5206b7b0185063d/oxford_sai%CC%88d_women_leadership_development_programme_course_convenor_sue_dopson.jpeg'], 'Kathryn Bishop': ['Profesora asociada, Saïd Business School, University of Oxford', 'https://www.getsmarter.com/rails/active_storage/representations/eyJfcmFpbHMiOnsibWVzc2FnZSI6IkJBaHBBbWNQIiwiZXhwIjpudWxsLCJwdXIiOiJibG9iX2lkIn19--72df151b6581d91f74ccae2757402a4c744c4ce8/eyJfcmFpbHMiOnsibWVzc2FnZSI6IkJBaDdCam9MY21WemFYcGxTU0lNTVRFd2VERXhNQVk2QmtWVSIsImV4cCI6bnVsbCwicHVyIjoidmFyaWF0aW9uIn19--e8e4d52386516ed9566f111cb5206b7b0185063d/oxford_sai%CC%88d_women_leadership_development_programme_course_convenor_kathryn_bishop.jpeg']}
What will set you apart: ['Un plan de desarrollo personal para ayudarla a crecer con confianza como líder. ', 'Herramientas para ayudarla a navegar los desafíos del lugar de trabajo que enfrentan las mujeres y responder a las presuposiciones culturales y de género. ', 'Comprensión de su estilo, sus fortalezas y sus conductas limitantes de liderazgo únicos, y la capacidad de reconocer su propia capacidad de acción.', 'Mejores habilidades y recursos de liderazgo centrales para el desarrollo y la transición como líder.', 'Orientación de expertos líderes de la industria y del cuerpo docente de Oxford Saïd, y acceso al grupo oficial de egresados de Oxford Executive Education en LinkedIn.']
About the certificate: Explore el desarrollo del liderazgo de las mujeres y obtenga un certificado oficial de asistencia de Saïd Business School, University of Oxford.
What past students think: {'Sharmila RajagopalGerenta de Comunicaciones Técnicas de Appspace': 'Me encantó este programa y me alegra mucho haberme inscrito apenas lo encontré en línea. El trabajo del programa se estructuró con una complejidad progresiva que comienza con la autorreflexión y la identificación de sus propias fortalezas y debilidades, contexto y estilos de liderazgo, para luego pasar a temas más complejos como estrategias de liderazgo, y finalmente utilizar los aprendizajes de este programa para pensar en su futuro como líder. Este programa, diseñado de forma única especialmente para mujeres, ha sido verdaderamente inspirador, educativo y empoderador.   Nos presentaron enfoques de liderazgo específicos para mujeres, los temas se debatieron tanto desde la perspectiva de los hombres como de las mujeres y escuchamos perspectivas, consejos y anécdotas personales de muchas líderes mujeres. Los foros de debate que formaban parte del trabajo del programa también les permitieron a las participantes compartir sus propias experiencias y alentarse y empoderarse unas a otras. La experiencia de aprendizaje en línea ha sido simplemente increíble. Recomendaría este programa a cualquier mujer que busque aprender los matices del liderazgo, ya que está especialmente dirigido a mujeres por mujeres, con valiosas experiencias colectivas.'}

title: Programa de Liderazgo en Sostenibilidad Empresarial de Oxford
about: Lidere prácticas comerciales sostenibles y formas contemporáneas de creación de valor.
Course overview:
Descripción general del programa99%La cantidad de directores ejecutivos encuestados que creen que la sostenibilidad será importante para el éxito futuro de su negocio.UN Global Compact (Jan., 2019).61%La cantidad de inversionistas institucionales que han aumentado su inversión en compañías que se destacan en factores ambientales, sociales y de gobierno (environmental, social and governance, ESG).KPMG (2020).Duración: 6 semanas (sin incluir la orientación)Las corporaciones están bajo un escrutinio cada vez mayor por sus contribuciones a la sociedad y al medio ambiente. Ante este trasfondo, una estrategia comercial que considere su impacto ambiental es vital. Existe una mayor demanda de líderes corporativos con la capacidad de impulsar la sostenibilidad y cambiar los métodos tradicionales de creación de valor hacia el concepto de triple resultado neto.El Programa de Corporaciones Sostenibles Líderes de Oxford adopta una perspectiva de nivel ejecutivo sobre la sostenibilidad corporativa y va más allá de las perspectivas tradicionales de medir el desempeño comercial y presentar informes de desempleo, para integrar factores ambientales, sociales y de gobierno (environmental, social and governance, ESG) a las prácticas corporativas. Con un enfoque en el liderazgo de sostenibilidad corporativa, este programa tiene como objetivo equipar a los líderes con las habilidades esenciales para abordar esta necesidad comercial fundamental.Examine el impacto de su corporación en el medio ambiente desde múltiples perspectivas, incluida una visión del cambio climático que representa el riesgo, las emisiones de carbono y la gestión de recursos naturales. Con la orientación de expertos, desarrollará la capacidad de impulsar estrategias efectivas de gestión del carbono, mientras se formulan indicadores clave de rendimiento (key performance indicators, KPI) eficaces para medir los esfuerzos de sostenibilidad de su corporación y la dependencia del capital natural, social y humano. Durante el transcurso de seis semanas, obtendrá acceso a conocimientos de expertos y a investigaciones líderes de Saïd Business School, University of Oxford. Cree un plan personal para desarrollar, implementar y liderar estrategias para lograr objetivos de desarrollo sostenible (ODS) en su organización, a medida que se esfuerza por influir en el cambio positivo y reducir el impacto de su organización en el medio ambiente.¿Este programa es para usted?l Programa de Corporaciones Sostenibles Líderes de Oxford es relevante para una amplia gama de funciones en todas las industrias. Este programa está diseñado para profesionales interesados en liderar activamente y dar cuenta de las transiciones corporativas positivas de bajas emisiones de carbono, circulares y climáticas.

Ya sea un líder corporativo actual, o aspire a serlo, o un profesional sénior con interés en buscar negocios sostenibles, se beneficiará de las perspectivas proporcionadas por este programa sobre la comunicación e implementación de estrategias comerciales que le permitan impulsar un cambio sostenible positivo. Si usted ocupa una función financiera o de operaciones, o trabaja en los sectores bancario, de inversión, de TI o de fabricación, una comprensión de las nuevas métricas de rendimiento y los métodos integrados de responsabilidad ESG le ayudará a facilitar la medición del impacto ambiental de su corporación.

Este curso se ofrece en español traducido. Se requiere dominio del inglés para navegar el curso, incluido el registro y el pago del curso, así como ciertos elementos del campus virtual.

La mayoría de los materiales didácticos y materiales de apoyo se han traducido del inglés original al español (tenga en cuenta que los videos tienen subtítulos). Las tareas y los comentarios se proporcionan en español. El apoyo académico y estudiantil está a cargo de hispanohablantes. El entorno de aprendizaje (campus virtual) está diseñado para ayudar a los hispanohablantes con dominio del inglés. El soporte técnico está disponible en inglés. Los certificados se proporcionarán en inglés.

Adicionalmente, se le pedirá que acepte los Términos y Condiciones en inglés que rigen el Curso. Se dispone de una copia en español aquí. Si hubiera algún conflicto entre las versiones en inglés y español de los Términos y Condiciones, prevalecerá la versión en inglés, según corresponda.

About the certificate: Aprenda sobre la creación de valor sostenible en corporaciones y obtenga un certificado oficial de asistencia de Saïd Business School, University of Oxford.
What past students think: {'Ole Oeystein Aspholmgerente ambiental, Industria de Petróleo y Gas': 'El Programa de corporaciones sostenibles líderes ha sido excelente y ha mejorado mi capacidad para desarrollar una estrategia de sostenibilidad progresiva pero realista para mi empresa. Un gran agradecimiento a todos los inspiradores tutores de los ámbitos académicos y de la industria que realmente hacen que este programa sea excepcional. Ha puesto la sostenibilidad en contexto a través de ejemplos teóricos y prácticos. Me han motivado para hacer un trabajo adicional para un desarrollo comercial más sostenible.'}

title: Artificial Intelligence in Business
about: Delve into AI’s industry vertical applications and discover new opportunities for business growth.
Course overview:
Course overview75%The percentage of executives who say they risk business failure in the next five years if they don’t scale their AI initiatives.Accenture (Nov, 2021).Top 10% of companiesTech innovation front-runners achieve two to three times revenue growth compared to their competitors.Accenture (2021).Duration: 5 weeks (excluding orientation)The age of data is well underway thanks to the proliferation of information, advancing computer technologies, and artificial intelligence (AI)-powered algorithms. Today’s companies work around the clock to leverage this billion-dollar industry’s potential.1 However, the fast pace of innovation has led to a widening skills gap. As a result, many executives lack the tools to implement AI adoption strategies in their businesses – a precursor to success in the data-driven economy.
Enhance your organization’s competitive edge with the Artificial Intelligence in Business online program from IE University, one of Europe’s leading higher-education institutions.2 Over five weeks, you’ll gain an overview of the AI landscape and unpack the use of machine learning (ML) and Big Data in business. The program features various real-world AI use cases and explores how the latest innovations have helped businesses across industries solve various problems. Guided by esteemed IE faculty, you’ll learn how to choose the correct algorithm to solve specific business problems and unpack AI’s limitations and ethical considerations. Finally, you’ll leave the program with a roadmap for implementing an AI strategy and managing change within your organization.
1 GlobeNewswire (Sep, 2021).2 IE University (2021).Is this program for you?If you’re in a leadership or executive role, this program will help you build the practical skills to solve problems, make strategic decisions, and ultimately lead your organization’s AI transformation. As a product or project manager in the digital transformation and technology space, this program’s practical content will help to enhance your knowledge of AI-enabled business solutions. Similarly, consultants will benefit from the opportunity to broaden their AI integration skill set. In turn, technical professionals such as data scientists and AI and ML specialists can draw on the program content to align their abilities with strategic business needs.

Convenors: {'Konstantina Valogianni': ['Assistant Professor, Information Systems and Technology, IE University', 'https://www.getsmarter.com/rails/active_storage/representations/eyJfcmFpbHMiOnsibWVzc2FnZSI6IkJBaHBBa1lUIiwiZXhwIjpudWxsLCJwdXIiOiJibG9iX2lkIn19--a4d2f808806a64c066944c818818a1d9137cb26d/eyJfcmFpbHMiOnsibWVzc2FnZSI6IkJBaDdCam9MY21WemFYcGxTU0lNTVRFd2VERXhNQVk2QmtWVSIsImV4cCI6bnVsbCwicHVyIjoidmFyaWF0aW9uIn19--e8e4d52386516ed9566f111cb5206b7b0185063d/ie_university_artificial_intelligence_in_business_online_program_page_course_convenor_konstantina_valogianni.jpg']}

Assessment is continuous and based on a series of practical assignments completed online. In order to be issued with a certificate, you’ll need to meet the requirements outlined in the program handbook. The handbook will be made available to you as soon as you begin the program.

title: Decision Making
about: Make more effective choices in both business and your personal life with an understanding of the drivers behind decision making.
University name: Yale School of Management Executive Education
Course overview:
Program overview35,000The average number of decisions a person makes every day.CBS News (Aug, 2019).46%The percentage of companies that go bankrupt due to ineffective decision making by their leaders.Psychology Today (Aug, 2019).Duration: 6 weeksIn an increasingly complex world, the decisions we make have a profound impact on our successes, both personally and professionally, and can influence the direction of our lives, careers, organizations, and even societies.The Decision Making online program from the Yale School of Management Executive Education gives you the knowledge and skills needed to make effective decisions across any context. Guided by expert faculty, you’ll develop an understanding of the psychological and behavioral drivers, biases, rules, and heuristics that form the foundation of how decisions are made. You’ll also explore the core pillars of decision making — context, uncertainty, and time — in order to better analyze your decisions and make more informed choices, no matter your situation.
Is this program for you?This program is useful for anyone who wants to master the art of effective decision making. Senior leaders and decision makers who often have to solve problems in the face of uncertainty would benefit from the content, as would professionals across a variety of functions. This includes people in fast-paced industries such as marketing, finance, IT, and business development. Those looking for guidance on how to make better decisions in their everyday life will also find great value in this program.
Course curriculum: {'Orientation module': 'Welcome to your Online Campus', 'Module 1': 'Principles of decision making', 'Module 2': 'Context and choice in decision making', 'Module 3': 'Context and decision rules', 'Module 4': 'Decision making under risk and uncertainty', 'Module 5': 'Time in decision making', 'Module 6': 'Integrating context, uncertainty, and time'}

title: Sustainable Food: Production and Processing
about: Discover new models, processes, and approaches for achieving sustainable food systems that can equitably meet the nutritional demands of an expanding global population within planetary boundaries.
Course overview: Course overview11.8%Over one in 10 adults will struggle with obesity in 2025 due to malnutrition caused by food insecurity.Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (2021).8–10%Up to a tenth of global greenhouse gas emissions are associated with food that is not consumed.United Nations Environment Programme (Mar, 2021).Duration: 8 weeks (excluding orientation)Global population growth is placing unprecedented strain on already-stretched modern food systems. With the added pressure of a changing climate, creaking supply chains, and greater consumer scrutiny, the need to transform these systems has become urgent.The Sustainable Food: Production and Processing online short course from the University of Cambridge Institute for Sustainability Leadership (CISL) equips you to shape resilient food systems to equitably feed the growing global population in a challenging environment. Over eight weeks online, you’ll explore the different aspects of a sustainable future food system, and the micro-, meso-, and macro-level changes required to transform the way food is produced, processed, and consumed. With guidance from expert CISL faculty, you’ll discover new business models, technologies, and processes for embedding sustainability into food supply chains, and build practical strategies for leading this transformation in your own organisation or sector. By the end of the course, you’ll have consolidated your learnings through a number of peer-centred live sessions and forum discussions, and will have developed your own Personal Action Plan for leading sustainability initiatives in your context.Is this course for you?This course will benefit individuals working at every stage of global or local food systems, from the supplier to the consumer. Agricultural professionals, including commercial and small-scale farmers, ranch managers, agricultural engineers or technicians, and agronomists will gain practical tools for delivering nutritious, affordable, and sustainable food to all. Those in the manufacturing, retail, wholesale, or service sectors, such as supply chain and procurement professionals, food and beverage managers, restaurateurs, and entrepreneurs aspiring to start a sustainable business will discover scalable models for achieving resilient food systems. And analysts, policymakers, consultants, and lobbyists working in finance, marketing, and public relations will learn how to clearly articulate the case for sustainable food production, processing, and consumption.This course is certified by the United Kingdom CPD Certification Service, and may be applicable to individuals who are members of, or are associated with, UK-based professional bodies. The course has an estimated 70 hours of learning. Note: should students wish to claim CPD activity, the onus is upon them. The University of Cambridge Institute for Sustainability Leadership and GetSmarter accept no responsibility, and cannot be held responsible, for the claiming or validation of hours or points.
Course curriculum: {'Orientation module': 'Welcome to your Online Campus', 'Module 1': 'The rapidly changing context of food', 'Module 2': 'A new sustainable food future', 'Module 3': 'New business models and approaches for sustainable food', 'Module 4': 'Embedding sustainability into food supply chains', 'Module 5': 'Innovations in sustainable food production and processing', 'Module 6': 'Leading transformational change in your context', 'Module 7': 'Developing your sustainable food Personal Action Plan', 'Module 8': 'Collaborating to create sustainable food systems'}

', 'An ambitious Personal Action Plan for leading strategic action, fine-tuned and strengthened through meaningful collaboration with your peers.', 'Unlimited access to 2U’s Career Engagement Network, offering you exclusive resources and events to support your professional journey and drive your career forward.']
About the certificate: Learn how to shape sustainable food systems and earn an official certificate of completion from the University of Cambridge Institute for Sustainability Leadership. Assessment is continuous and based on a series of practical assignments completed online. In order to be issued with a certificate, you’ll need to meet the requirements outlined in the course handbook. The handbook will be made available to you as soon as you begin the course.

title: Women as Business Leaders
about: Join and empower the next generation of female leaders.
University name: Martin J. Whitman School of Management
Course overview:
Course overview29%The highest recorded proportion of senior roles held by women is still less than one third.Grant Thornton (Mar, 2019).$28 trillionThe amount that could be added to the global GDP in 2025 by fully closing the workplace gender gap.Bank of America (Aug, 2019).Duration: 8 weeks (excluding orientation)Gender diversity promotes different perspectives in teams, and creates an inclusionary environment that’s more open to opportunities. It's also been proven to drive innovation and increase business performance.1 However, female professionals still face unique obstacles that can hinder their career progression beyond middle management.
The Women as Business Leaders online short course will enable you to gain insight into those challenges by reflecting on your own leadership style, and exploring shared-learning experiences to forge your own career path, fulfil your ambitions and be visible to the next generation of female business leaders. You’ll also develop key managerial competencies in communication, influence, and negotiation that will support you in navigating bias and other barriers. The combination of self-reflection, collaborative learning, and practical application offers a holistic and supportive platform for tackling an issue that affects industries around the globe.
1 World Economic Forum (Apr, 2019).
Is this course for you?This course is aimed at women in business who want to learn from inspiring female leaders and develop a personal growth plan. However, it will benefit all professionals who recognize the importance of championing the executive development of women, advocating for equality in their industry, and closing the gender gap in workforce participation. Current and aspiring managers will gain from an inclusive approach to identifying and overcoming the workplace barriers experienced by women, in order to spearhead a culture of diversity in their organization.
Course curriculum: {'Orientation module': 'Welcome to your Online Campus', 'Module 1': 'Learn from inspirational female leaders', 'Module 2': 'Promote diversity and inclusion', 'Module 3': 'Create an innovative environment', 'Module 4': 'Develop your authentic leadership style', 'Module 5': 'Lead through change', 'Module 6': 'Promote your personal brand', 'Module 7': 'Create work-life balance', 'Module 8': 'Chart your path'}

What will set you apart: ['A personalized action plan to advance your professional development as a woman in business.', 'The skills needed to shape your authentic brand of leadership and communication.', 'A theoretical and practical knowledge to overcome failure aversion, improve negotiation tactics, and drive diversity and innovation.', 'Fresh perspective on gender equality and the advantages of a diverse workforce, along with an understanding of what is required to support and empower women in your industry.', 'Unlimited access to 2U’s Career Engagement Network, offering you exclusive resources and events to support your professional journey and drive your career forward.']
About the certificate: Develop your leadership skills, and learn how you can support and promote women in business while you earn an official certificate of participation from the Martin J. Whitman School of Management at Syracuse University.Assessment is continuous and based on a series of practical assignments completed online. In order to be issued with a certificate, you’ll need to meet the requirements outlined in the course handbook. The handbook will be made available to you as soon as you begin the course.
What past students think: {'Katie SheldonGroup Account Supervisor, WILDTYPE, a TBWA\\WorldHealth Company': 'The content was useful and very applicable to both my personal and professional lives. The online learning experience was new to me, so it took some time to adjust, but it became easier as the course progressed. My understanding of women leadership improved throughout this course. I enjoyed the discussion forums and loved hearing from other women who work in different locations and industries.'}

title: Project Management: A Hybrid Approach
about: Aim for organizational success and implement the best of Agile and traditional project management methodologies.
Course overview:
Course overview87.7 millionThe amount of individuals employers will need working in project management-oriented roles by 2027.PMI (2017).9.9%The amount wasted from each dollar due to poor project performance, or $99 million for every $1 billion invested.PMI (2018).Duration: 8 weeks (excluding orientation)Hybrid project management (PM) methods are becoming increasingly popular as a way of answering the paradox between flexibility (Agile approaches) and structure (traditional approaches).
This course from Syracuse University’s School of Information Studies (iSchool), a top-ranked U.S. library and information science school,1  teaches you how to utilize hybrid project management methodologies effectively. You’ll be encouraged to reflect on, analyze, and develop solutions to challenges within your context as you learn to develop strategic integration practices, communicate effectively, mitigate risks and ensure operational readiness. Harness the best of predictive and adaptive practices, and capitalize on the strengths of both. Guided by experts, you’ll improve your current project management skills and walk away with an action plan to facilitate your organization’s agility transformation.
1 US News (2019).Is this course for you?This course has been designed for project managers and technology and operations professionals across different industries who are preparing for significant shifts in organizational processes. It’s also relevant to any professionals and managers who want to update their project management skills or differentiate themselves by learning how to apply hybrid methodologies. Those wanting to improve their organization's project management capabilities will benefit by gaining context-specific approaches that don't compromise on existing processes.

GetSmarter is approved by the Project Management Institute (PMI®) as an Authorized Training Partner (ATP), a partnership that enables you to join the world’s largest project management network. This Project Management: A Hybrid Approach course will count for 50 PDUs in total, and the division of hours is as follows: Technical - 35.00, Leadership- 5.00, Strategic -10.00.
PMI is responsible for setting project management standards and providing certification. By taking this course, you’ll gain PMI-endorsed skills that are globally recognized. You can also use these learning hours towards furthering your professional project management development. See PMI.org for more information.
Please note that GetSmarter and Syracuse University bear no responsibility for the reporting of these PDUs and/or hours to the PMI. The onus, therefore, falls on you to do so.
The PMI® Authorized Training Partner seal is a mark of the Project Management Institute, Inc.

title: Change Management for Digital Transformation
about: Discover contemporary tools to manage change in the digital economy.
Course overview: Course overview76%The share of business leaders who predict that their organisation will face significantly more change in the next five years than the previous five. Deloitte (2021).60%The percentage of executives who believe digital transformation will be their most critical growth driver in 2022.PwC (2022).Duration: 6 weeks (excluding orientation)Digital transformation is not just a buzzword, it’s a strategic priority. New technologies and digitalisation can improve business performance, but only if organisations equip themselves with the right capabilities to manage the disruption these changes bring about.This Change Management for Digital Transformation online short course from the National University of Singapore (NUS) Advanced Computing for Executives (ACE) will give you an in-depth understanding of the tools and techniques required to manage, plan for and execute change in your organisation. In addition to providing strategies against risk and uncertainty at different levels, it also covers the entire life cycle of digital transformation planning and implementation, from assessing an organisation’s preparedness for change, through implementing it effectively and managing its impact on all stakeholders.By the end of this course, you'll be equipped with a tailored digital transformation change plan to secure buy-in at the individual, team and organisational level, identify key areas of resistance and gain insights into how these can be mitigated.Is this course for you?This course is designed for change managers and executives in charge of implementing new technologies and setting digital transformation in motion in their organisations. These professionals will be equipped with an understanding and appreciation of what it takes to implement and manage change that lasts. Leaders who want to understand the negative effects change can have on employees and how best to avoid these will benefit from learning how to keep their business running successfully while ensuring that their employees are happy and motivated. Those actioning the digital transformation will learn how to actively plan systems and set processes in place for change. Business leaders will develop the knowledge to plan, manage and monitor external stakeholder expectations effectively. Additionally, professionals will gain plans, strategies and frameworks necessary for successfully managing change.If you’re in a traditional change management position, this course will provide you with contemporary tools to manage change in the digital economy and effectively work on digitalising organisations or projects. This course is also designed for non-traditional change managers who require change management skills to effectively deliver on digital initiatives.
Course curriculum: {'Orientation module': 'Welcome to your Online Campus', 'Module 1': 'Rethinking how you manage change for digital transformation', 'Module 2': 'Constructing a compelling narrative for change', 'Module 3': 'Preparing for change', 'Module 4': 'Managing change', 'Module 5': 'Monitoring and measuring change', 'Module 6': 'Establishing a sustainable digital culture'}
